title: Center For Natural Medicine, Inc. - Portland, OR
sitename: Center For Natural Medicine, Inc. - Portland, OR | Center for Natural Medicine Clinic - Wellness, NDs, Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Portland Oregon, CNM is one of the leading naturopathic healthcare facilities in the Northwest. Since 1984, we offer a variety of health care services including primary care naturopathic medicine, diagnostic testing, acupuncture, massage therapy and a large natural product dispensary. We also have a diverse team of healthcare practitioners that includes naturopathic physicians, licensed acupuncturists, and licensed massage therapists working collaboratively to provide our patients with well-researched and innovative treatments. [Areas of Focus](http://demo.themeton.com/medical/service-item/gynecology/) We are the 1st Naturopathic "Patient Centered Primary Care Home" in the United States The Oregon Health Authority has granted the Center for Natural Medicine its Tier 4 recognition as a Patient Centered Primary Care
